review: Amazon Fire TV is a good, reliable product that is easy to hook up and operate. BUT, the Amazon Prime membership, which is required to use Amazon's capabilities, is just their gateway to get you to spend even more money on new movies, shows and anything more recent. The free programs and movies they offer are pretty much the same as all the other streaming companies and will charge you to watch the new stuff. If I knew this I would have never bought this for my household.If you do a lot of online shopping in order to take advantage of the Prime benefits then this is for you. Otherwise, look at the competitors to see who offers the best item for you.
author: Jeffery H. King
